data.title: ASAP Rocky Net Worth, Age, Rihanna, Height, Real Name, Family & Biography
data.meta_description: Asap Rocky is a Famous Rapper in American. Here, know more about Asap Rocky's career, age, family, pics, biography & more.
data.text:
ASAP Rocky, whose real name is Rakim Mayers, is an American rapper, singer, songwriter, record producer, and actor. He gained prominence in the hip-hop scene with the release of his mixtape "Live. Love. ASAP" in 2011. Born on October 3, 1988, in New York City, ASAP Rocky is known for his unique style, blending elements of hip-hop, rap, and fashion. ASAP Rocky has achieved critical acclaim and commercial success with multiple albums and singles throughout his career. His debut studio album, "Long. Live. ASAP" (2013), reached number one on the Billboard 200 chart, establishing him as a rising star in the music industry. In addition to music, he has pursued acting, appearing in films like "Dope" and "Monster." A$AP Rocky is also recognized for his fashion sense and collaborations with various brands and designers. As a prominent figure in hip-hop, he is celebrated for his creativity, versatility, and influence on popular culture. Read ASAP Rocky biography

ASAP Rocky Net Worth

ASAP Rocky net worth is $20 million, with entrepreneurship and acting contributing to his financial success. He has been involved in numerous notable fashion campaigns, leveraging his distinctive style and fashion influence to secure lucrative endorsements and deals, further augmenting his ASAP Rocky net worth. With that ASAP Rocky net worth, he is among richest celebrities.

Asap Rocky Age

Born on October 3, 1988 in Harlem, New York, United States, Asap Rocky age is 36 years. He has made significant strides in the music industry. Asap Rocky’s age reflects his experience and maturity in the music world.

Asap Rocky and Rihanna

Asap Rocky and Rihanna, two powerhouses in the music industry, confirmed their relationship in November 2020. Asap Rocky and Rihanna have since welcomed two children together, RZA Athelston and Riot Rose Mayers.

Asap Rocky Height

Asap Rocky height is of 5 feet 10 inches, stands tall in the music industry. Asap Rocky’s height is just one aspect of his commanding presence on the music stage.

Asap Rocky Real Name

Asap Rocky’s real name, Rakim Athelaston Mayers, is often a point of curiosity for fans. Despite his fame, Asap Rocky real name remains a significant part of his identity.
